snippet: A Knicks fan since he was a child growing up in the Bronx, the comedian Robert Klein found himself in the middle of the Jeremy Lin craze only as a matter of luck.
abstract: Comedian and lifelong New York Knicks fan Robert Klein finds himself in the middle of the Jeremy Lin craze only as a matter of luck, after being ambivalent about retaining his courtside seat at Madison Square Garden.
lead_paragraph: A Knicks fan since he was a child growing up in the Bronx, the comedian Robert Klein found himself in the middle of the Jeremy Lin craze only as a matter of luck.

headline.seo: Robert Klein Enjoys Linsanity but Finds Nothing Funny About It
headline.main: Enjoying the Lin Craze, but Not Finding Much Funny About It
headline.print_headline: Enjoying the Lin Craze, but Not Finding Much Funny About It
